title.bibl: Dziennik Zwiazkowy, Apr. 13, 1917. Building Permits in South Chicago

div.bibl: Dziennik Zwiazkowy, Apr. 13, 1917. BUILDING PERMITS IN SOUTH CHICAGO

body.p: August Borda, 8707 Exchange Avenue, will erect a two-story brick building, to coat $5,000, at 7959 Escanaba Avenue.

Anthony Wawruszkiewicz, 8527 Muskegon Avenue, has received a permit for the erection of a two-story building at 8533 Muskegon Avenue. The building will cost $3,500. Z. Jakubowski has the contract for the masonry, and P. Kejnicki for the carpentry work.
